title.narrative: OUTPUT 6.4: TECHNICAL SUPPORT

description.narrative: Availability of adequate technical expertise to support the programme delivery and the office management, which contributes to Economic And Social Policy General, Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Social and economic vulnerabilities of disadvantaged children and their families are identified and addressed.

sector.narrative: Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

description.narrative: General Economic, Commercial and Labour Affairs policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
